short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps in focusing while using Youtube by hiding extra suggestions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It hides extra suggestions by youtube and keeps your focus on video that you are watching. It has three different modes - Super Focused, Focused and Normal.
In Super Focused Mode, HomePage suggestions, comment section and side video suggestion will not get showed to you.
In Focused  Mode, Only side video suggestions will not be shown.
In Normal Mode, You can surf youtube normally like before.

This extension will be useful to people who use youtube for watching tutorials or work related stuffs.
